## Toolbox.onClick\_() method

Handles on click events for when the toolbox or toolbox items are clicked.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected onClick_(e: MouseEvent): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  e | MouseEvent | Click event to handle. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
